action.p: Ajax Modulator will intercept ($.preFilter) xml and json ajax requests to avoid multiple calls to the same resource.
Of course, it will do what it takes to stay invisible to the application.

div.p: Both buttons are implemented to do 5 ajax requests to the same resource. Each one will append a pong to the list.
But, for the modulator just one ajax request is made, while the other one does all 5 requests.
Tip: you can use $.ajaxSetup to turn the modulator default
